name: Style
description: An object encapsulating a style's format and other properties.

properties.name: addIndent
properties.description: Indicates if text is automatically indented when the text alignment in a cell is set to equal distribution.

properties.name: autoIndent
properties.description: Indicates if text is automatically indented when the text alignment in a cell is set to equal distribution.

properties.name: borders
properties.description: A Border collection of four Border objects that represent the style of the four borders.

properties.name: builtIn
properties.description: Indicates if the style is a built-in style.

properties.name: font
properties.description: A Font object that represents the font of the style.

properties.name: formulaHidden
properties.description: Indicates if the formula will be hidden when the worksheet is protected.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for the style.

properties.name: includeAlignment
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the AutoIndent, HorizontalAlignment, VerticalAlignment, WrapText, IndentLevel, and TextOrientation properties.

properties.name: includeBorder
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the Color, ColorIndex, LineStyle, and Weight border properties.

properties.name: includeFont
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the Background, Bold, Color, ColorIndex, FontStyle, Italic, Name, Size, Strikethrough, Subscript, Superscript, and Underline font properties.

properties.name: includeNumber
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the NumberFormat property.

properties.name: includePatterns
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the Color, ColorIndex, InvertIfNegative, Pattern, PatternColor, and PatternColorIndex interior properties.

properties.name: includeProtection
properties.description: Indicates if the style includes the FormulaHidden and Locked protection properties.

properties.name: indentLevel
properties.description: An integer from 0 to 250 that indicates the indent level for the style.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: The Fill of the style.

properties.name: locked
properties.description: Indicates if the object is locked when the worksheet is protected.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the style.

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: The format code of the number format for the style.

properties.name: numberFormatLocal
properties.description: The localized format code of the number format for the style.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The text orientation for the style.

properties.name: textOrientation
properties.description: The text orientation for the style.

properties.name: readingOrder
properties.description: The reading order for the style.

properties.name: shrinkToFit
properties.description: Indicates if text automatically shrinks to fit in the available column width.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment for the style.

properties.name: wrapText
properties.description: Indicates if Microsoft Excel wraps the text in the object.
